rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment states the virus was discovered using neutral language.
No loaded rhetorical question is present in the text.
The segment reports virus discovery location but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes where the virus was discovered, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment reports location where the virus was discovered, not prices or economic metrics.
The segment reports a sequence of events/locations but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
No direct quotes or attributed statements providing a dominant frame.
Factual report of the sequence of detections without explicit framing cues.
